LanguageData.MicroTurretMKI.label: Micro turret
LanguageData.MicroTurretMKI.description: A miniature turret that automatically fires at nearby enemies. Its Micro AI brain isn't very smart, and can't be directly controlled, so beware of friendly fire.
LanguageData.Bullet_MicroTurretMKI.label: Micro turret bullet
LanguageData.Gun_MicroTurretMKI.label: Micro turret gun
LanguageData.Gun_MicroTurretMKI.description: A micro gun working in a micro turret.
LanguageData.Bullet_MicroThingSpawnerMKI.label: Micro turret creator
LanguageData.Gun_MicroTurretLauncher.label: Micro turret launcher
LanguageData.Gun_MicroTurretLauncher.description: A launcher for micro turrets. The projectile itself will do virtually no damage, but its nanobots will create a micro turret near the place of impact.
